0.2.name: wordpress/restrict-content-pro-bbpress
0.2.description:
This is an add-on for the Restrict Content Pro plugin. It does not function on its own.

This plugin will add support for limiting bbPress forums and topics to paid subscribers only. It makes it exceptionally easy to have members-only forums

This add-on is still in beta so please let me know any feedback you have.

Learn more about Restrict Content Pro: http://pippinsplugins.com/restrict-content-pro-premium-content-plugin/
